result.adr_address: Shop 9, Level 1, V City Mall, 83 Heung Sze Wui Road, Tuen Mun, Hong Kong
result.formatted_address: Shop 9, Level 1, V City Mall, 83 Heung Sze Wui Road, Tuen Mun, Hong Kong
result.name: PizzaExpress V city

reviews.text: Prompt and attentive staff. Reasonably tasty food. 2 adults one kid under HkD 300 lunch specials

Staff are very professional in nature, which is incredibly rare in HK. It makes a nice change from having a glum, disinterested waitress grunting at you and throwing your food on the table as is the case in most other hk restaurants.

There is a kid menu, a glass of juice, a small portion pizza or pasta, a dessert for kid and a cup of hot chocolate cost HK$89. This is a good option for kid. That day we only ordered "Prama" pizza and apple crumble. We enjoyed the friendly services offered by nice staff.
Spacious with fair staff. Pizza bit too salty and food not hot enough.
The service is really good. The seats a reasonable comfortable.

result.adr_address: Shop 9, Level 1, V City Mall, 83 Heung Sze Wui Road, Tuen Mun, 香港
result.formatted_address: Shop 9, Level 1, V City Mall, 83 Heung Sze Wui Road, Tuen Mun, 香港
result.name: PizzaExpress V city

reviews.text:
食物樣樣美味！難怪經常滿座！

星期六下午，2人在這輪候了15分鐘便入座了，看到有Signature Set($289的二人餐有1個頭盤+2個主菜+2杯汽水，連加一平均每位$159；$499的四人餐有2個頭盤+4個主菜+4杯汽水，連加一平均每位$137)就要了前者：

頭盤的是牛油果番茄沾醬(有6個薄脆包，新鮮熱辣，沾上開胃的醬，很美味！)。

主菜要了一個意粉和一個薄餅(+15)：卡邦尼忌廉意粉(開始吃的第一兩口是很不錯，非常creamy，忌廉汁很濃郁，但很膩，二人share著吃都差點吃不完，在擔心接下來還能吃到薄餅嗎？)和阿爾巴薄餅(+$15。是大批，餅底薄，熱辣辣，芝士的量很多，有拉絲的效果，整體味道很好！結果真的完成不了，剩3塊要打包)。

整體的食物質素都高分，雖然卡邦尼忌廉意粉有點過膩，但很美味！每次想吃輕食的西餐，必然會想起Pizza Express！
Prompt and attentive staff. Reasonably tasty food. 2 adults one kid under HkD 300 lunch specials
食物水準不錯，全場坐滿客，但上菜速度仍十分快，服務員也是香港中少有的勤快和有禮貌，套餐價錢也很適中。
有足夠地方給多人聚餐， 唯食譜 沒有太多選擇。
還可以吧！價錢、食物、服務都算合理。
